    • Constructor Detail

      • MetroConnection

        public MetroConnection(MetroNode source,
               MetroNode destination,
               MetroLine line,
               int time)
        Whilst not necessarily required, each the nodes will require a connection from both directions. Useful should the train break down going in 1 direction.
        Parameters:
        source - A MetroNode the train will be departing from
        destination - A MetroNode the train will arrive at
        line -
        time - An integer value giving the amount of time required to use this connection
